name: Peach Vanilla Smoothie
description: I was thinking of peaches and almonds when I began working on this granola-thickened smoothie, but it ended up tasting more like peach ice cream with a hint of vanilla.
keywords: almond milk, peach, vanilla, healthy, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 large or 1 1/2 medium ripe peaches, white or yellow, pitted about 6 ounces
A few drops of fresh lemon juice (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until frothy, about one minute.
